events.name: Creative
events.description: Teams will be required to think of a unique solution to a problem of their choice based on the theme given.

events.name: Encryptid
events.description: Tech Syndicate's annual cryptic hunt, a scavenger hunt-like experience, based on web security, cryptography, and steganography.

events.name: Programming
events.description: Participants will compete with each other to solve exciting programming challenges.

events.name: Filmmaking
events.description: “If it can be written or thought, it can be filmed”, Participants will be required to create a film on the topic given.

events.name: Gaming
events.description: In round 1, participants will compete with each other in the game “Splitgate”.

events.name: Photography
events.description: Participants will be required to click a photograph on their interpretation of the prompt given.

events.name: Scratch
events.description: “Keep calm and Start creating”, make a game on the theme using “Scratch 3”
